TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InputSourceType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.InputSourceType Any = int32(-256)

Docs.summary: A special input source constant that is used when filtering input devices to match devices that provide any type of input source.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.InputSourceType ClassMask = int32(255)
ClassMask = 255

Docs.summary:
A mask for input source classes.
Each distinct input source constant has one or more input source class bits set to specify the desired interpretation for its input events.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.InputSourceType ClassNone = int32(0)
ClassNone = 0

Docs.summary:
The input source has no class.
It is up to the application to determine how to handle the device based on the device type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.InputSourceType Keyboard = int32(257)
Keyboard = 257

Docs.summary:
The input source is a keyboard.
This source indicates pretty much anything that has buttons.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.InputSourceType Mouse = int32(8194)
Mouse = 8194

Docs.summary: The input source is a mouse pointing device. This code is also used for other mouse-like pointing devices such as trackpads and trackpoints.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
